autumn.util.test

Interface TestCase


  • public interface TestCase
    An instance of this interface stores vital information regarding a single unit-test.

    Caution: This interface may have additional methods added in the future.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void describe(java.lang.String text)
      This method sets the description of this test-case.
      void expect(java.lang.Class expected)
      This method specifies the type of exception that the test-case will hopefully throw.
      Delegate function()
      This method retrieves the delegate that refers to the test function.
      void name(java.lang.String name)
      This method sets the name of this test-case.

    • Method Detail

      • function

        Delegate function()
        This method retrieves the delegate that refers to the test function.
        Returns:
        the test function in functor form.

      • name

        void name(java.lang.String name)
        This method sets the name of this test-case.
        Parameters:
        name - is the new name of the test-case.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if name is null.

      • describe

        void describe(java.lang.String text)
        This method sets the description of this test-case.
        Parameters:
        name - is the new description of the test-case.

      • expect

        void expect(java.lang.Class expected)
        This method specifies the type of exception that the test-case will hopefully throw. In other words, the test-case fails, if it does not throw this type of exception.
        Parameters:
        expected - is the type of exception that should be thrown by the test-case.
